constraints.name: boundary_constraint
constraints.description: 移动操作不能超出矩阵边界

constraints.name: obstacle_avoidance
constraints.description: 移动路径上不能包含危险单元格

constraints.name: target_reachability
constraints.description: 必须能够到达目标单元格

constraints.name: program_validity
constraints.description: 所有 G 指令必须跳转到程序中存在的行

constraints.name: termination_condition
constraints.description: 当到达目标单元格时，程序终止
